com.google.api.ads.dfa.lib.client

Class DfaSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.dfa.lib.client.DfaSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAuth2Compatible, AdsSession

    public class DfaSession
extends Object
implements AdsSession, OAuth2Compatible
    A DfaSession represents a single session of DFA use.

    Implementation is not thread-safe.
